name: HRM CONSULTING GmbH
tag_list: personalberatung, personalberater, recruiting, recruiter, headhunter, cabinet-de-recrutement
overview:
HRM CONSULTING GmbH is a Berlin-based human resources consultancy that will support you in finding and selecting specialist and management personnel in the fields of marketing, consulting and IT, whether you’re just starting out or thinking of expanding.

We are driven by a clear focus on specific fields. This enables us to realise synergies while we search for your vacant positions. Our customers include start-ups, mid-sized companies and international corporations.

We know and understand the needs of our target group and have a reliable and diverse network on hand to help you in Berlin or nationwide. Our methods, which combine classic head hunting with the use of new media, mean that our project lead times are short.
